description: Trims the last iterable (colon-separated) section of the tag of the received signal.

c1927e5c-f5ca-42e1-aedd-78efd6748dfe.name: data
c1927e5c-f5ca-42e1-aedd-78efd6748dfe.description: Signal identical to what was received but with the last iterable section removed from the tag.

inputFunctions.ca54dccf-ed97-4731-8eb0-ef76fe19e844:
const matches = /^(.*):\d+$/.exec(tag);
outputs.data(data, matches && matches[1] || tag);

name: flow/Tag trimmer
